GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article by its corresponding id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for corresponding article id

comments.body: I hate streaming eyes even more
comments.author: icellusedkars

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a comment to an article and returns the comment

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates an article by its id

article.title: Does Mitch predate civilisation?
article.author: icellusedkars
article.body: Archaeologists have uncovered a gigantic statue from the dawn of humanity, and it has an uncanny resemblance to Mitch. Surely I am not the only person who can see this?!

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment by comment id.
